name: Yi Lin 0006
content: Yi Lin | Homepage of Yi LIN, Sichuan University Skip to the content. [Latest News] [Education] [Working Experience] [Research Interests] [Selected Publications] [CV] [ReseachGate] [Google Citation] Yi LIN Ph.D., Associate professor Senior Member, IEEE College of Computer Science, Sichuan University yilin@scu.edu.cn No.24 South Section 1, Yihuan Road, Chengdu, China, 610065 I am looking for some self-motivated Ph.D. and master students, if you are interested in my research, please contact me! News! A special issue is launched on Aerospace journal, please contributes your papers! Thanks very much! Education 11/2017-11/2018, visiting Ph.D. student, Department of Civil and Environmental Engineering, University of Wisconsin-Madison, USA. (Research on Intelligent Transportation Systems, supervised by Prof. Bin Ran) 09/2015-06/2019, Ph.D. student, College of Computer Science, Sichuan University, China. (Supervised by Prof. Jianwei Zhang) 09/2010-06/2013, M.E. student, School of Mechanical Engineering, Sichuan University, China. (Supervised by Prof. Dejun Ren) 09/2006-06/2010, B.E. student, School of Mechanical Engineering, Harbin University of Science and Technology, China. Working Experience 06/2021-now, associate professor, College of Computer Science, Sichuan University, China. 08/2019-05/2021, assistant professor, College of Computer Science, Sichuan University, China. 07/2013-09/2015, software engineer, Wisesoft. Co. Ltd, China. Research Interests Air traffic management: traffic flow prediction, trajectory prediction, conflict detection, … Machine learning: deep learning (CNN, RNN, GNN, GAN, …) Human-computer Interactions: speech recognition, natural language understanding, … Computer vision: image enhancement, biometrics, … Intelligent Transportation Systems: traffic modeling, incident detections, … Social Activities CCF Intelligent Transportation Chapter Executive Committee. CICC Air Traffic Control Board Member. Associate Editor for the Journal of Intelligent and Fuzzy Systems (JIFS). Editorial Member for Journal of Electronics and Information Technology (JEIT), Advanced Engineering Sciences (AES). Leading Guest Editor for Aerospace Journal. Selected Publications [ReseachGate] [Google Citation] Latest News Dec 09 2023, our paper was accepted for publication in “AAAI2024”. Dec 01 2023, I am now a senior member of the IEEE. Sep 12 2023, our paper was accepted for publication in “Engineering Applications of Artificial Intelligence”. Aug 22 2023, our paper was accepted for publication in “Information Fusion”. Aug 14 2023, our paper was accepted for publication in “Nature Communications”. Congrats to Zheng Zhang and all the authors! Aug 13 2023, our paper was accepted for publication in “IEEE Transactions on Audio, Speech and Language Processing” (TASLP). Jul 25 2023, our paper was accepted for publication in “ACM MM23”. Jul 10 2023, our paper was accepted for publication in “Information Fusion”. Congrats to Zhen Yan! Apr 28 2023, our paper was accepted for publication in “IET Biometrics”. Congrats to Tingting! Apr 18 2023, our paper was accepted for publication in “IEEE Transactions on Circuits and Systems II: Express Briefs”. Congrats to Dongyue and Zichen! Apr 16 2023, I have been approved to be an Associate Editor of the Journal of Intelligent and Fuzzy Systems (JIFS). Apr 14 2023, I joined in Sichuan Youth Federation for Science and Technology. Jan 11 2023, our paper was accepted for publication in “IEICE TRANSACTIONS ON INFORMATION AND SYSTEMS”. Congrats to Peng Fan and Dongyue! Dec 17 2022, our paper was accepted for publication in “Transportation Research Part E-Logistics and Transportation Review”. Congrats to Zhen Yan! Nov 18 2022, our paper was accepted for publication in “ACM Transactions on Asian and Low-Resource Language Information Processing”. Congrats to Dongyue! Aug 25 2022, our paper was accepted for publication in “IEEE Transactions on Intelligent Transportation Systems”. Congrats to Dongyue! Jul 14 2022, our paper was accepted for publication in “Optics Express”. Jun 9 2022, our paper was accepted for publication in “Optics Express”. May 1 2022, our paper was accepted for publication in “Optics Express”. Apr 19 2022, our paper was accepted for publication in “Chinese Journal of Aeronautics”. Jan 08 2022, our paper was accepted for publication in “Knowledge-based Systems”. Congrats to Pan Zhang! Dec 24 2021, our paper was accepted for publication in “Aerospace”. Congrats to Zhen Yan! Nov 12 2021, our paper entitled “Automated traffic incident detection with a smaller dataset based on generative adversarial networks” (“Accident Analysis & Prevention”) is selected as an ESI highly cited paper. Oct 09 2021, our paper was accepted for publication in “COMPUTERS AND ELECTRONICS IN AGRICULTURE”. Sep 07 2021, our paper was accepted for publication in “IEICE Trans. Information and Systems”. Aug 24 2021, our paper was accepted for publication in “Applied Soft Computing”. Jul 29 2021, our paper was accepted for publication in “IEEE Transactions on Human-Machine Systems”. Jun 10 2021, our paper was accepted for publication in “IET Intelligent Transport Systems”. Apr 25 2021, I am honored as an Editoral member of “Journal of Electronics and Information Technology (JEIT)”. Apr 19 2021, our paper was accepted for publication in “Aerospace Science and Technology”. Mar 01 2021, my reivew paper entitled “Spoken instruction understanding in air traffic control: challenge, technique and application” was accepted for publication in “Aerospace”. Nov 15 2020, we received a research funding from “National Natural Science Foundation of China (NSFC-Key project)”, as the Investigator. Nov 10 2020, our paper was accepted for publication in “Algorithms”. Sep 18 2020, I received a research funding from “National Natural Science Foundation of China （NSFC-Young scientist)”, as the Principal Investigator (“PI”). Aug 12 2020, our paper was accepted for publication in “Neurocomputing”. Aug 9 2020, our paper was accepted for publication in “Transportmetrica A: Transport Science”. Jul 25 2020, our pre-print paper entitled “ATCSpeech: a multilingual pilot-controller speech corpus from real Air Traffic Control environment” was selected for presentation at the INTERSPEECH 2020. Jun 28 2020, my paper was accepted for publication in “IEEE Transactions on Neural Networks and Learning Systems”. May. 22 2020, my paper was accepted for publication in “Accident Analysis & Prevention”. CV Up-to-date CV
